DOC.brief_summary: This monocentric registry should provide information on the extent how patients with pulmonary diseases such as pulmonary hypertension will benefit from rehabilitation treatment. The data may provide a basis for further prospective studies showing the treatment of patients with pulmonary diseases especially by physical activation.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study on Rehabilitation Patients With Pulmonary Hypertension and Other Pulmonary Diseases
DOC.criteria: Pulmonary Disease Inability or refusal to give written informed consent
